alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Northern Monterey Bay; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 3:11PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN ALAMEDA...SANTA CRUZ... SOUTHEASTERN SAN MATEO...SOUTHEASTERN CONTRA COSTA AND SANTA CLARA COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM PST... At 311 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers near Boulder Creek, or 8 miles west of Saratoga, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Jose, Fremont, Sunnyvale, Santa Clara, Livermore, Mountain View, Pleasanton, Milpitas, Palo Alto, Santa Cruz, Cupertino, Newark, Campbell, Morgan Hill, Saratoga, Los Gatos, Los Altos, Corralitos, Discovery Bay, and Scotts Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
